A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is just awful\, plot holes everywhere. It really ruins the Star Wars brand with this garbage movie. I've never been so disappointed with a Star Wars movie ever\, including a movie itself. This movie shoves so many political agenda down your throat. You do not want to see this movie\, it's such a disgrace to a Star Wars brand. Rian Johnson should be fired for this\, including Kathleen Kennedy!!!
